idea:
GetLitt! is a subscription based platform to build reading and writing skills through gamification for children below the age of 13 years.

Getlitt! provides a curated platform of best ebooks across publishers (like Amar Chitra Katha, Tinkle, Tulika, Pratham, Young Zubaan etc.) and uses gamification and motivation through social reinforcement from children’s network and community to keep kids engaged.
name: WRITER'S BUG LEARNING PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Myself, Anamika Dixit founder of The Kaatn Trail would like extend our warm regards to entire Startup India Team. I would love to introduce my brand The Kaatn Trail to you.


The Kaatn Trail is symbolic to tremendous love and passion for what we curate here. At TKT, we create simple and minimalistic yet smart and classy, all day wear designs that are made from natural fibers, hand-woven, khadi fabrics sourced from various skilled artisans across India. We truly love collaborating contemporary silhouettes with traditional hand-woven Indian textiles. We call them timeless beauties. Most of our fabrics are herbal dyed, which means dyes are made out of herbs, fruits, plants and flowers.

Our prime focus is to craft patterns that are skillfully simple, elegant and can be worn from a weekday to weekend! It leaves us in immense pride that we bring our heritage fabrics into play! On this journey, we aim to revisit the forgotten path of our heirloom and also carve new trail for our beloved textiles. Hence we decided to aptly name it as The Kaatn Trail. The word Kaatn is derived from “Cotton” and rightly spelled as K-aa-t-n.

 After spending years in corporate world we realized, that’s one place (workplace) where khadi has not seeped–in yet. With a four-fold increase in working women population, we felt it was need of the hour to introduce khadi in a refreshingly contemporary look making it a complete package from being classy to comfortable.

With the growing awareness for eco-friendly clothing and sustainable fashion, it’s highly imperative that we take conscious efforts and ensure rightful production of garments. Our fabrics are tested for dye and also we have personally visited our weaving units to ascertain the genuineness of the fabrics used by us.

Although it all began with khadi, however, we also have pure handloom fabrics serving the purpose for us!

We always wanted to give back to the society in whatever small way we could. With this objective in our heart, we reached out to a NGO and they helped us to connect with the set of skilled women from less privileged society. These determined women help us with creative ideas to up-cycle our fabric scraps by making scrunchies, potli bags etc. We are already working with them for making accessories like neckpieces and finger rings from the scraps. More work means more income for them and that gives us a sense of fulfillment.

You can visit us on -

Website - www.thekaatntrail.com

Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/thekaatntrail

Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/tkt2019/
name: The Kaatn Trail

idea:
Oleaf began with its own olive plantations in Rajasthan and collaborated with local farmers, generating employment to rural women in Bikaner, Rajasthan, and mastering the art of cultivating olives. With thorough research, Oleaf has started creating olive-based products to cater to the world.


With a strong background of olive cultivation in Rajasthan, one of the aridest climates of India, Oleaf did extensive research on the benefits of olive leaves. With the encouraging results, Oleaf started working on a method to process and pack olive leaves in the form of tea, to bring out and to maintain it's beneficial properties and freshness. Thus, Oleaf Herbal Olive Tea was born with the benefits of a recognized superfood. 


The large scale cultivation has also enabled Oleaf to create organic honey. Oleaf Olive Orchards Honey is a sign of great quality and purity!


Extending the Oleaf line, the company will soon launch other olive-based products such as Olive Oil, Mustard Oil, Mustard Honey, Olive Wine and Cold Infusions.


Our vision is to generate large scale employment and globally spread the medicinal benefits of Indian herbs. With the intent of making the world a healthier place, the journey of Oleaf has begun.


With farming at the forefront, we have ambitious plans of creating a health-based product line and reinforce India’s presence globally.


https://www.oleafherbal.com/
name: OLEAF TEA PRIVATE LIMITED
